casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Edward ODOM, Jr.
v.
STATE of Louisiana NO. 2017-KH-1155 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 8, 2018 Denied. Relator has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review. See State ex rel. Odom v. State, 15-1971 (La. 1/9/17), 208 So.3d 876 . WEIMER, J., recused.
